alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 6:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns County through 715 PM EDT... At 636 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picolata, or 9 miles north of Hastings, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, South Ponte Vedra, Vilano Beach, Saint Augustine South, Saint Augustine Shores, Anastasia, Bakersville, Elkton and South Ponte Vedra Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
